    I’m going to grad school!

    less than 1 minute read

    I am thrilled to announce that I will be remaining at the University of Oregon to gain my PhD in Molecular Biology through the Institute of Molecular Biology (IMB)! Because my first year in the program will consist of rotations in three different labs (as well as taking classes and working as a teaching assistant), I do not know exactly which lab I will be joining or the exact topic that I will be studying. However, I do know that I want to continue my work into the intricate relationship between the microbiome and human health.

    Tags: Grad School, Professional Development

    Categories: blog

    Updated: April 8, 2021
